price: Ka ce: "Allah ne Yake tsĩrar da ku daga gare ta, kuma daga dukan baƙin ciki sa'an nan kuma ku, kunã yin shirki!"
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُنَجِّيكُم مِّنۡهَا وَمِن كُلِّ كَرۡبٖ ثُمَّ أَنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahu yunajjīkum min'hā wamin kulli karbin thumma antum tush'rikūna
